programme.desc: The boys must embrace the latest fad to hit South Park Elementary or risk their status as the coolest kids in school.(n)

programme.desc: A Mormon kid moves to South Park and it's up to Stan to beat him up. But when Stan and his dad meet their new Mormon neighbours, they become fascinated with how genuinely nice they are.(n)

programme.desc: The Prince of Canada is about to take a Princess and Ike is obsessed with the Royal Wedding.(n)
